goodmenproject.com/2015/04/raise-a-glass.snippet: Water is a part of our lives in many ways that we often dont think about. Without pure water we would not have playgrounds for surfing, wakeboarding, or snowboarding. These activities rely on clean water sources now, and for future generations.
